problem_text: Does there exist a 2-Engel finite p-group G of nilpotency class greater than 2 such that Aut G = AutcG·Inn G, where AutcG is the group of central automorphisms of G? A. Caranti
answer: Yes, it does (A. Abdollahi, A. Faghihi, S. A. Linton, E. A. O’Brien, Arch. Math. (Basel), 95, no. 1 (2010), 1–7).
